children.text:
Glimmer 2.0.12

This application is made by Nicolas Baret (conception and development)

All rights are reserved to Nicolas Baret.

If you have any comment please send me a message at cyberniko@gmail.com

This app is FREE for standard use, but in app purchase allows you to unlock some cool features !
In app purchase also helps the developper to improve the quality and stability of this product.

Enjoy !


Thanks a lot to nice people who translated this application :
- Liliya Fontalina (russian)
